name: DearS (6)
summary: Takeya is leading his life dealing with "living in hard own world" Ren, and deepening the exchange with the DearS. In front of him, a new DearS appeared. That girl was a no-good slave just like Ren, named "Zero Numbers". And then, again, a new DearS...
